languages.text: "Это неправильно! Вы не можете так обращаться с нами! Что вы намерены с нами делать? Мы хотим жить!"

traits.locale_text: "Хватит обращаться с нами, как с животными! Мы — не скот, который вы можете тащить на заклание через всю вселенную! Мы хотим жить!"

languages.text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"
languages.original_text: "Это неправильно! Вы не можете так обращаться с нами! Что вы намерены с нами делать? Мы хотим жить!"

traits.locale_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"
"This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"
"This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"
"Stop treating us like animals! We are not livestock! You can't just drag us across the universe and then slaughter us! We want to live!"

languages.text: “别这样！你们不能这么对待我们！你们打算对我们怎么样？我们要活命！”
languages.original_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"

traits.locale_text: “别再把我们当成畜生了！我们不是牲口！你们不能就这么把我们拖到宇宙里，然后大肆屠杀！我们想活命！”

languages.text: «¡Esto no es justo! ¡No pueden tratarnos así! ¿Qué van a hacer con nosotros? ¡Queremos vivir!».
languages.original_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Dejad de tratarnos como animales! ¡No somos ganado! ¡No podéis arrastrarnos por medio universo al matadero! ¡Queremos vivir!».

languages.text: 「これは間違っている！どうして我々をこのように扱う？我々は生きたいんだ！」
languages.original_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちを動物のように扱うな！俺たちは家畜じゃない！宇宙の彼方まで引きずり、虐殺するなんて許さないぞ！俺たちは生きたいだけなんだ！」

languages.text: "Das ist nicht richtig! So könnt Ihr uns nicht behandeln! Was habt Ihr mit uns vor? Wir wollen leben!"
languages.original_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf, uns wie Tiere zu behandeln! Wir sind kein Vieh! Ihr könnt uns nicht einfach durchs Universum zerren und dann abschlachten! Wir wollen leben!"

languages.text: « C'est un scandale ! Vous n'avez pas le droit de nous traiter comme ça ! Que comptez-vous faire de nous ? On veut vivre ! »
languages.original_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez de nous traiter comme des animaux ! On n'est pas du bétail ! Vous ne pouvez pas nous traîner d'un bout à l'autre de l'univers, pour ensuite nous massacrer sans raison ! On veut vivre ! »

languages.text: "Bu çok yanlış! Bize böyle davranamazsınız! Ne yapacaksınız bize? Yaşamak istiyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "This isn't right! You can't treat us like this! What are you going to do to us? We want to live!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu çok yanlış! Bize böyle davranamazsınız! Ne yapacaksınız bize? Yaşamak istiyoruz!"
